Description: Profile preserved of Attic black-glazed pottery salt-cellar; interior black; possible inscription in centre of bowl; exterior black with reserved band at junction with foot; stand-ring reserved; graffito on underside.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Musée du Louvre. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1442)
